item.title: Forget Unicorns—Invest in Camels
item.description: How investing in cash flowing small businesses can make you a multimillionaire

item.title: Google’s AI Mode Can Now Start Making Restaurant Reservations for Customers
item.description: The AI Mode from Google can help people find a table, but there’s still one key step it can’t take.

item.title: Airbnb’s Joe Gebbia May Have a New Gig—in the White House
item.description: Gebbia, who previously worked with DOGE, is expected to be tapped as the nation’s first chief design officer.

item.title: Meet Milwaukee’s 15 Fastest-Growing Private Companies
item.description: These 15 companies from the Milwaukee metro area earned a spot on the 2025 Inc. 5000 list.

item.title: Waymo Gets First Permit to Test Autonomous Vehicles in New York City
item.description: The cars will have a trained specialist behind the wheel as Waymo starts testing them in parts of Manhattan and Brooklyn.
